responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Command Injection Vulnerability in Elixir.js
    analysis: |
      The `installMissingDependencies` function in `src/config/config.js` is vulnerable to command injection. It constructs a shell command using user-controlled input (`dependencies`) without proper sanitization. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands by crafting a malicious package name.
    cwe: CWE-77
    function_names:
      - installMissingDependencies
    filenames:
      - src/config/config.js
    classification: very promising
```

leads.headline: Command Injection Vulnerability in Elixir.js
leads.analysis: The installMissingDependencies function in src/config/config.js is vulnerable to command injection. It constructs a shell command using user-controlled input (dependencies) without proper sanitization. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands by crafting a malicious package name.
